mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(ITEM_CODE) FROM INVENTORY_ITEM WHERE ITEM_CODE = #{value}

SELECT T1.ITEM_IDX , T1.COMPANY_IDX , T2.COMPANY_NAME , T1.ITEM_CODE , T1.CONTENT , FORMAT(T1.UNIT_PRICE, 0) UNIT_PRICE , FORMAT(T1.INITIAL_QUANTITY, 0) INITIAL_QUANTITY , FORMAT((SELECT ((IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN ST2.TRANSACTION_TYPE = '출고' THEN -ST1.AMOUNT WHEN ST2.TRANSACTION_TYPE = '입고' THEN ST1.AMOUNT ELSE 0 END), 0)) + T1.INITIAL_QUANTITY) FROM ITEM ST1 JOIN TRANSACTION ST2 ON ST1.TRANSACTION_IDX = ST2.TRANSACTION_IDX WHERE ST1.ITEM_CODE = T1.ITEM_CODE), 0) CURRENT_QUANTITY FROM INVENTORY_ITEM T1 JOIN COMPANY T2 ON T1.COMPANY_IDX = T2.COMPANY_IDX
WHERE T1.COMPANY_IDX = #{value}
